long_description: Delivering a wide field of vision with a versatile lens for medium to bright light, the Oakley O2 XL snow goggles offer a large, comfortable fit, even with most prescription eyewear. Fire Iridium lens has an amber to orange tint, 12% visible light transmission (VLT) and a mirror finish, enhancing contrast and cutting glare in medium to bright light. Large cylindrical lens opens up your peripheral view for a wide field of vision. Antifog treatment along with frame and lens venting combat lens fogging, delivering clear vision in changing weather. 3-layer face foam is constructed of a dense base, a plush mid layer and a soft fleece top layer; design ensures a tight seal, good moisture management and maximum comfort. Durable frame is made of a flexibile plastic to ensure a comfortable fit all day long and in changing temperatures; frame has been streamlined to help expand peripheral view. Discreet frame notches at temples provide compatibility with most prescription eyewear without compromising fit. The helmet-compatible design of the Oakley O2 XL snow goggles fits medium- to large-size faces.
